text:
The ASF has issued new guidelines for source file header at  http://www.apache.org/legal/src-
headers.html that are required for all releases after November 1st.  This will require touching all or almost 
all of the source files for both the trunk and 1.2 branches.
creator: carnold@apache.org

text: Initial commit on log4j 1.2 branch in rev 511036.
creator: carnold@apache.org
carnold@apache.org
text:
Updated selected file on trunk (aka log4j 1.3) in rev 527394 in preparation for backporting plugins, rule-
based filtering and receivers for Chainsaw on log4j 1.2 effort.
Fixed in log4j 1.2.  Walking away from log4j 1.3.
creator: carnold@apache.org
